name: Shawn
info: A Sinner adept at supporting allies. Energy Recovery Speed increases by 10%.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Deceptive Love
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: New Exclusive Ultimate [Deceptive Love]. Shawn applies [Weakspot] mark to an enemy once every 2 seconds, prioritizing those closest to her unmarked with [Weakspot]. This effect lasts for #6 / 8 / 10 seconds#. [Deceptive Love] has a 15-second cooldown after each use and can only be used twice per battle.

media.title: JP Shawn Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

guide.title: Pull Advice
guide.text:
**Weakspot team's enabler. You must have her to make Bianca shine.**
Extremely recommended to level for players who have Bianca leveled. Bianca, the carry of Weakspot team, cannot actually apply Weakspot herself. Shawn is the best Weakspot-applying unit, hence her value in the team.

guide.title: Shackles
guide.text:
**S0** - Shawn functions fully at S0, which you can obtain for free by completing Day 1 of Bianca's [Perfect Vote] event.

**S2** - Extends the duration of her P1, which can help with managing Weakspot stacks.

guide.title: Notable Synergies
guide.text:
**Bianca ★**
Bianca makes use of Shawn's constant Weakspot applications to do huge amounts of damage.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Inversion
crimebrandSets.note: Generates energy so Shawn can Ult as much as possible to apply Weakspot for Bianca.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Hope + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Standard energy set so Shawn can have her first Ult up as quickly as possible.

crimebrandSets.name: Justice + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Buff the whole team's Attack by 5% whenever Shawn Ults.

crimebrandSets.name: Afterglow + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Boosts nearby allied Sinners' Attack by 10% after Shawn uses Ult. Although the Attack increase provided is larger than Justice, Afterglow has a 20s cooldown and does not apply mapwide, making it more difficult to use.

shackles.title: Energy Overflowing
shackles.description: At the start of the battle, Shawn gains 10 energy.

skills.name: Heartbreak
skills.description: Shawn attacks with energy, dealing (Attack * 80%) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Online Romance
skills.description: Shawn deals (Attack * 450%) Physical Damage to all enemies within the skill range, applying a [Weakspot] mark to them. [Online Romance] can be charged up to 2 times.

skills.name: Infatuation
skills.description:
After hitting an enemy with [Online Romance], the enemy receives the [Fascination] effect for #3# seconds.
[Fascination]: When a [Weakspot] mark is removed, it will be reapplied.

skills.name: Solace of Love
skills.description: When an allied Sinner applies a [Weakspot] mark, Shawn enables all allied Sinners to recover HP equal to (Attack * 60%). This effect can be triggered up to once every second.

criminalRecord:
The subject, a local Eastsider, was once a moderately famous voice actor and participated in related audition and entertainment shows. Following a scandal about her harassment of her colleague, she's disappeared from public view but continues running her frauds on the internet, posing a significant threat to society. Detention is recommended.

--

Since her detention by the MBCC, the subject's personal device and social media accounts have been confiscated and her internet access is strictly limited. Under Chief's supervision, she has come clean with the victims of her online dating frauds. So far, there have not been new victims.
mutationAssessment: +++* Ability Summary By transmitting sound waves through the device, she can seize affection from specific individuals, leaving them in severe despair and depression, and even rendering them completely dysfunctional in extreme cases. The subject will absorb the extracted affection and receive a boost to her mood and power. +++* Awakening Signs After being, as she claims, betrayed by someone she loved, the subject attempted revenge, only to be ridiculed and cursed. Upon realizing the love had always been one-sided, her special power awakened. +++* Corruption State The subject shows only mild signs of corruption and no physical abnormalities. However, having stayed mostly at home and devoted almost all of her energy to cultivating her online relationships, her mental state is poor and requires close monitoring.
ecbFlavourText:
"Who should be chosen today?"
"This one...? Or this one?"

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: Before you take me to the Bureau, give me one more minute to reply to the last three messages. These people love me. If they don't get my responses, they will be sad.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: 私を管理局に連れて行く前に、1分だけ待ってくれ。最後に3通だけ返信がしたい。もし返事がなかったら、私を愛してくれている人たちが悲しむだろう。
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 관리국에 데려가기 전에 1분만 줘, 메시지 3개만 답장할게. 답장이 없으면 날 좋아하는 사람들이 슬퍼할 거야.
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 带我回管理局前，再给我一分钟，回复最后三条消息。如果得不到回应，爱我的人们会伤心的。
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 帶我回管理局前，再給我一分鐘，回覆最後三則訊息。如果得不到回應，愛我的人們會傷心的。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: You have expectations of me? All right, I'll try my best to live up to them.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: 私に期待しているのか？じゃあ、なるべくまともに生きるよ。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - KR: 나한테 기대하는 거야? 그럼 최대한 잘살아 보려 노력할게.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: 对我抱有期待？那我尽力活得像样一些吧。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: 對我抱有期待？那我盡力活得像樣一些吧。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: This is my social media account. Seek me out online. You'll like my internet persona better.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: これは私のSNSアカウントだ。ネットで会いに来てくれ。この私なら、あなたをもっと幸せにできる。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 내 SNS 계정이야, 여기로 연락해. 여기서라면 내가 널 더 기쁘게 해줄 수 있을 거야.
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 这是我的社交账号，来这里找我吧。这个我，更能讨你开心。
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 這是我的社交帳號，來這裡找我吧。這個我，更能討你開心。
voicelines.Level Start - EN: Go wherever your heart desires, and I shall follow close behind with my love accompanying.
voicelines.Level Start - JP: 望む所へ行けばいい。私と私の愛は後から追いつこう。
voicelines.Level Start - KR: 가고 싶은 데로 가. 나와 내 마음도 곧 뒤따를 테니까.
voicelines.Level Start - CN: 去你想去的地方吧，我和我的爱意随后抵达。
voicelines.Level Start - TW: 去你想去的地方吧，我和我的愛意隨後抵達。
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: 「マッチング成功、連絡先が追加されました」
voicelines.Win Battles - CN: “配对成功，私人联系方式已添加”。
voicelines.Win Battles - TW: 「配對成功，私人聯繫方式已添加」。
voicelines.Lose Battles - EN: People falling out of love, happens all the time.
voicelines.Lose Battles - JP: 愛が薄れるのはよくあることだ。
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - EN: In the name of almighty love!
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: 返していない……メッセージが……
voicelines.Die in Battles - KR: 아직 답장 못 한… 메시지가 남았는데…
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Hello... Hello. I know it. My real voice only returns when I'm with you.
voicelines.Greeting - JP: こんにちは？ゴホン、こんにちは。やっぱりあなたの前でだけ、自分の声を見つけられるみたいだ。
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 안녕? 크흠, 안녕. 역시 너랑 있을 때만 원래 내 목소리로 돌아갈 수 있어.
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 你好？咳咳，你好。果然只有在你面前，我才能找回自己的声音。
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 你好？咳咳，你好。果然只有在你面前，我才能找回自己的聲音。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: I only do online dating. Two souls meeting bare, free from physical burden and past baggage... This is the safest form of love.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: 私はネット恋愛しか認めない。 外見を知ることも、肉体的な制約も、過去の経験を知る必要もない。2つの魂が裸で出会い、ぶつかり合うことで、最も安全な愛が生まれるんだ。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 난 랜선 연애만 해. 서로 외모를 알 필요도 없고, 현실의 제약 없이 과거를 알 필요도 없지. 두 영혼이 자유롭게 만나 가장 안전한 사랑을 하는 거야.
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 我只接受网恋。不用知道外貌、不受实体制约、不需要了解过往经历，两个灵魂一丝不挂地相遇，碰撞出最安全的爱。
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 我只接受網戀。不用知道外貌、不受實體制約、不需要瞭解過往經歷，兩個靈魂一絲不掛地相遇，碰撞出最安全的愛。
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: The agency keeps assigning me crime dramas, but I've come across some romance scripts during my vocational training. These stories are basically the same: love at first sight based on looks, chance encounters everywhere, and the cliché happily-ever-after ending... Heh, don't you find these love stories a bit fearsome?
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: 事務所から回ってくる仕事はほとんど刑事ドラマなんだが、研修資料で恋愛ものの台本をいくつか目にしたことがある。でも、ストーリーはどれも似通っていたよ。主人公たちは相手の外見に一目惚れして、その後あちこちで出会い、やがて永遠に一緒に暮らすことになる……ふん、恐ろしい展開だと思わないか？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 에이전시에서 나한테 주는 작품은 대부분이 범죄 수사 드라마였어. 그런데 교육 자료에서 로맨스 대본을 본 적이 있거든. 스토리는 다 비슷하더라고. 주인공 둘이 외모 때문에 서로 첫눈에 반하고, 여기저기에서 우연히 마주치다가 결국 평생을 함께하는 낡아 빠진 이야기… 흠, 이런 전개 너무 끔찍하지 않아?
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 事务所给我安排的工作几乎都是刑侦剧，但我在培训材料里见过一些爱情剧本。故事都差不多，主角二人因为外貌一见钟情，之后在哪都能遇见，最终永远生活在一起……呵，你不觉得，这样的剧情发展很可怕么？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 事務所給我安排的工作幾乎都是刑偵劇，但我在培訓材料裡見過一些愛情劇本。故事都差不多，主角二人因為外貌一見鍾情，之後在哪都能遇見，最終永遠生活在一起……呵，你不覺得，這樣的劇情發展很可怕嗎？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: Is the Bureau in the market for some spare cell phones? Long story short, I once mixed up the chat boxes of two online friends. To avoid such unprofessional mishaps, I bought a bunch of cell phones—one for each friend. I still have many backups in my cupboard, packages intact.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: 管理局は使わなくなった携帯電話を回収してくれるのか？以前、二人の相手のチャット画面を間違えたことがあったんだ。二度とプロらしからぬ状況にならないよう、携帯をたくさん買って一人ずつ専用の端末で連絡するようにしているんだ。今でも、未開封のスペア機が引き出しに山ほどあるよ。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 혹시 관리국에서 안 쓰는 휴대폰 회수해 갈 생각 없어? 전에 채팅창 두 개를 헷갈린 적이 있어서 더는 이런 일 없게끔 휴대폰을 여러 대 사놨거든. 휴대폰 하나당 한 사람과만 연락할 수 있게 말이야. 지금 내 서랍에 아직 포장도 안 뜯은 공기계가 몇 대 있어.
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 你们管理局愿意回收闲置手机吗？以前，我把两个聊天对象的对话框搞混过，为了防止不专业的情况再次发生，我买了很多手机，一部手机只用来联系一个对象。直到现在，我的柜子里还有不少没拆封的备用机。
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 你們管理局願意回收閒置手機嗎？以前，我把兩個聊天對象的對話框搞混過，為了防止不專業的情況再次發生，我買了很多手機，一部手機只用來聯繫一個對象。直到現在，我的櫃子裡還有不少沒拆封的備用機。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: "Your profile page is unique." That's how every relationship of mine began. But I find myself lost for words when dealing with you. Is it because our relationship exists in real life?
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 「あなたのプロフィールはユニークだね」。今までの関係は全て、この言葉から始まっている。でもあなたには、何を言っていいか分からないんだ。この関係が現実のものだからだろうか？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 피드 분위기가 좋네.' 난 대화를 시작할 때 전부 이 말로 시작해. 그런데 너한테는 뭐라고 얘기해야 할지 모르겠어. 우리 관계가 현실에서도 이어져서 그런 걸까?
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: “你的主页很特别。”我的每段关系都是从这句话开始。面对你，我却不知道说些什么好，是因为我们的关系存在于现实吗？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 「你的主頁很特別。」我的每段關係都是從這句話開始。面對你，我卻不知道說些什麼好，是因為我們的關係存在於現實嗎？
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: Eating, walking, sleeping, working... these daily tasks pain me. Nothing brings me joy except the fleeting moments of love. They're what keep me going each day.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 食べる、寝る、歩く、働く。こうした日常の全てが私に苦痛を与える。でも愛される瞬間だけ、幸せを感じるんだ。その一瞬のために、今日まで耐えてきた。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 먹고, 자고, 걷고, 일하는 일상이 내게는 고통스러워. 난 사랑을 받는 순간에만 기쁨을 느껴. 그 순간순간 때문에 지금까지 버틴 거야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 吃饭、睡觉、走路、工作，这些日常全都让我痛苦，只有得到爱意的一瞬能感到快乐。靠着这一瞬，我坚持到了今天。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 吃飯、睡覺、走路、工作，這些日常全都讓我痛苦，只有得到愛意的一瞬能感到快樂。靠著這一瞬，我堅持到了今天。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: The thing is, my voice used to be different. Back then, I dreamed of being a top voice actor capable of portraying all sorts of characters, hoping my fans would feel proud when they mentioned my name... Heh, in a way, I guess my dreams have come true. But this voice that my followers adore, I don't like it at all.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: 実は、昔は今と違う声だったんだ。その頃は、一流の声優になって、色んなキャラクターを演じて、ファンが口々に私の名前を挙げて自慢してくれたら、なんて妄想もしていたよ……ふっ、ある意味夢は叶ったかな？まぁ、フォロワーに愛されているこの声は、あまり好きではないんだけど。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 사실 전에는 내 목소리가 이렇지 않았어. 그때는 잘나가는 성우가 돼서 여러 캐릭터를 연기해 보고 싶었지. 팬들이 내 이름을 언급할 때면 날 자랑스러워했으면 했어… 뭐, 어떻게 보면 그 꿈이 이루어진 셈이지? 그런데 난, 팬들이 좋아하는 이 목소리가 별로 마음에 들진 않아.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 其实我以前的声音和现在不一样。那时，我也幻想过成为顶级声优，演绎各种各样的角色，希望粉丝提起我的名字时，能为我感到骄傲……呵，某种意义上，我的梦想也算实现了吧？可这个被追随者们喜欢的声音，我自己却不喜欢。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 其實我以前的聲音和現在不一樣。那時，我也幻想過成為頂級聲優，演繹各種各樣的角色，希望粉絲提起我的名字時，能為我感到驕傲……呵，某種意義上，我的夢想也算實現了吧？可這個被追隨者們喜歡的聲音，我自己卻不喜歡。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: I've sent the words "I like you" to many, many people. But strangely, when I text you, I always type them in and delete them over and over again... I don't know what's stopping me from sending them to you. Perhaps, in my heart of hearts, I want you to hear it from my mouth.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: 「好きだ」という3文字を、今まで何度も送ってきた。ただあなたとのチャットになると、打っては消して、結局送れなかった……きっと、面と向かって言いたかったんだろう。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 좋아해'라는 말, 지금까지 수도 없이 보내봤어. 그런데 너와 채팅할 때만 자꾸 썼다가 지우게 되고, 보내질 못하겠어… 어쩌면 이 말을 너에게 직접 들려주고 싶은 건가 봐.
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: “喜欢你”这三个字我曾经发送过很多遍，唯独在你的聊天框里，我却输入、删除、不敢发出来……或许，我是想当面把这句话说给你听。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 「喜歡你」這三個字我曾經發送過很多遍，唯獨在你的聊天框裡，我卻輸入、刪除、不敢發出來……或許，我是想當面把這句話說給你聽。
voicelines.Idle - EN: Are you asleep? If not, just listen to my voice... and you'll fall asleep…
voicelines.Idle - JP: もう寝た？まだなら、私の声を聞けば……眠れる……よ……
voicelines.Idle - KR: 자? 아직 안 자면 내 목소리를 들어 봐… 곧 잠에 들 수 있을 거야…
voicelines.Idle - CN: 睡了吗？没睡的话，听着我的声音……就睡着了……
voicelines.Idle - TW: 睡了嗎？沒睡的話，聽著我的聲音……就睡著了……
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: When someone repeatedly likes my profile page, it's usually to catch my attention and get a response from me. What about you? What do you want from such continuous physical contact with me?
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 私のプロフィールに何度も「気になる」を押す人たちは、私の注意を引いて返信を貰おうとしているんだ。あなたは？現実で私に触れ続けることで、私に何を求めているんだ？
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 내 피드에 계속 '좋아요'를 누르는 사람들은 보통 내 관심을 끌어서 답장받고 싶어 하는 사람들이야. 넌? 현실에서 계속 날 터치하다니, 내게 바라는 거라도 있어?
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 那些反复点赞我主页的人，是希望引起我的注意得到我的回复。你呢？在现实中不断触碰我，想要我做什么？
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 那些反覆點讚我主頁的人，是希望引起我的注意得到我的回覆。你呢？在現實中不斷觸碰我，想要我做什麼？
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Is this how people usually feel on their first date with someone they met online? I get so nervous around you that I can't even control my voice.
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: これが、ネットでの恋愛が現実になる感覚か？あなたの近くにいると、緊張して声を上手くコントロールできないんだ。
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 이게 바로 랜선 연애가 현실이 된 기분인가? 네 곁에 있으면 긴장해서 목소리가 이상해져.
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 这就是奔现吗？在你附近，我就紧张到控制不了声音。
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 這就是奔現嗎？在你附近，我就緊張到控制不了聲音。
voicelines.Dispatch - EN: I'm not exactly good at anything that's not online. But if it's for you, I'll give it a try.
voicelines.Dispatch - JP: ネット以外は得意じゃないんだが、あなたが望むならやってみるよ。
voicelines.Dispatch - KR: 난 인터넷 세상 말고는 잘 몰라. 하지만 네가 원하는 거라면 한 번 시도는 해 볼게.
voicelines.Dispatch - CN: 我不擅长网络以外的事，如果是你希望我去，我可以试试。

arrestRec1: The subject first encountered Chief during the Gray Mirror incident and harassed Chief persistently over the following months. Ultimately, Chief personally led a team to detain the Sinner.
arrestRec2: Coming from a middle-class family in Eastside, she befriended a female neighbor when she was young. As adults, they trained together as voice actors and participated in a voice acting audition. The subject's charming voice and appearance won her a decent place in the audition.
arrestRec3: During a live performance on the audition, she suddenly announced her withdrawal. Subsequently, her "friend," who was also a fellow contestant, went onstage and accused her of long-term harassment. She attempted to defend herself but was rendered speechless. The accusation ruined her reputation, while her "friend" capitalized on the fame brought by the incident and won the contest.
arrestRec4: The subject later hid her identity and blended in with her "friend's" fans. Leveraging her knowledge of this "friend," the subject successfully approached her and started an online relationship with her under a false name. After confessing her true identity, the subject was ridiculed, which awakened her special power. A few days later, the "friend" committed suicide due to depression.
servingTerm1: The subject maintains dozens of social media accounts and over a hundred online romantic relationships. Her prey spans a wide range and comes from all age groups and professions.
servingTerm2: The subject used to live a reclusive life in a rented apartment. She seldom exercised and had an irregular routine and a monotonous diet. This has resulted in her pale complexion, physical weakness, malnourishment, and liver and kidney issues.
servingTerm3: The subject frequently shows an unusual interest in the Bureau's staff and Sinners. She's repeatedly attempted to chat them up and ask for their contact information, but all in vain.
servingTerm4: Recently, the subject's interest has noticeably shifted to Chief. Besides the usual bombardment of online interactions, she always tries her best to get Chief's attention when they meet, openly engaging in physical contact. Typically, such behaviors are met with an over-the-shoulder throw by Chief.
